Reviews.Title: Small, not too light, short battery life.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Philos"
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop last week and sent it right back. It's small enough, but quite bulky for a 13" laptop. The description on the Amazon page said it was less than 5", but that's really not the case. It's battery life was also quite short--just a little over 3 hours using eco-mode. It isn't that light either. I have a 16" Toshiba and the difference between the two in terms of weight seemed so minimal. Also, the back part of the laptop, where the battery is inserted is very noticeably bigger ('fatter') than the front. I was looking for a really lightweight one that I could bring around with me. The good thing about this Toshiba model of course is that it's got an optical (DVD) drive, the others from ACER and HP at this size don't. Unfortunately, I'm going to have to get an ACER 13" as I need a lightweight machine that's got 4-5 hours at least of juice. Toshiba's are generally of good quality, but this 13" one was just not for me. (I also wish Toshiba's would start making slim laptops again like the ones I had a couple years ago. Their new models tend to be on the 'fat' side. Decent price though--as I got the one (last week) for only $ 498. Sent it back to Amazon via UPS.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: elmar
Reviews.Content: Speed is great, lots of storage space...smaller than my old dell, but not too small like my netbook. The design looks awesome too, although I'm not too fond of gloss...however I'm able to get passed that so I just love it! Would recommend it to students and those who need a laptop at home

Reviews.Title: Another winner from Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Another excellent product from Toshiba, from whom I have purchased several laptops. The only negative I found was that it contains only two, not the typical three, USB input ports.

Reviews.Title: Regrettable
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed that this laptop came with an overheating problem. I took it to Jamaica where it was to be used. The problem developed, it was taken to Intcomex Jamaica to be serviced under warranty but to date I am still without the Laptop. Very regrettable! :(

Reviews.Title: fantastic
Reviews.Author: Qudratullah
Reviews.Content: It's realy good computer for the window 7 and works realy good only battery is not very good and the scratches are more than the show on amazone.

Reviews.Title: FAIL Total !!!! :-(
Reviews.Author: jimaro
Reviews.Content: Compré esta toshiba, pensando en que iba a ser una buena inversion y me equivoqué.. desde la primera ves que la encendí, a los 15 minutos se quedo congelada y no respondio mas.. sino hasta que la apagué.  Reinstalé el SO nuevamente y ha sido lo mismo.. a cada momento se queda "pegada". y no responde de ninguna manera sino es apagandola.  ahora voy a tener que recurrir a una devolucion y todo el tiempo que eso conlleva.lastima, le tenía Fe a las Toshiba. de ahora en adelante creo que seguire con mi marca favorita "Dell".

Reviews.Title: toshiba L635
Reviews.Author: Williamrb77
Reviews.Content: Computer is great so far; looks and handles good, one of the downsides is the software. The software running under windows7 is ok but there alot of downloads which can interupt my work, but the updates keep the computer running smoothly.

Reviews.Title: Fiasco!!!  Fiasco!!!
Reviews.Author: Evelin
Reviews.Content: After to have had a Toshiba Satellite from the 2005, I thought that I went to have the same experience when I bought another new one, but was not thus, from the beginning frisaba and after months in center of repair of Toshiba in my country, she hoped that she followed well, and after 5 months she returned to give problems me, at the moment is 2 monts  old in repair center again.  I believe that I will not risk to buy another Toshiba in my life.Fiasco!!!  Fiasco!!!Después de haber tenido una Toshiba Satelite desde el 2005, yo pensé que iba tener la misma experiencia cuando yo comprara otra nueva, pero no fue así, desde el principio se frisaba  y después de unos meses en el centro de reparación de Toshiba en mi país, esperaba que siguiera bien, y después de 5 meses ella volvió a darme problemas, actualmente tiene 2 meses en centro de reparación otra vez.  Creo que no me arriesgaré a comprar otra Toshiba en mi vida.

Reviews.Title: Disk Crashed After 9 Months - And No Warranty
Reviews.Author: Director Mitch
Reviews.Content: My review title says it all - the hard drive failed 9 months after purchase, and it was outside the warranty window for a hard drive replacement.  It took $200 to repair it (I had it done at an authorized Toshiba repair shop, so could have done it for about half if I did it on my own).  Considering this was a ~$500 computer, paying another $200 nine months later just to keep it running is unacceptable.

Reviews.Title: Reset reset reset
Reviews.Author: Pen&Paper;
Reviews.Content: If you buy this pc, you will get to know the reset/on-off button very well.  Within the first few keystrokes this little bugger locks up. Terribly frustrating.  It may be due to the op sys (win 7) or the MS office software.  I don't know.  Either way the thing should not lock up when you're on the internet! That doesn't even require complicated computing power. It locked up while I was installing the software!  It locked up while I entered the wireless router info.  It locked up when I opened MS Word.  Ugh. I hate it.  My partner likes it and lives in hope that it will magically get better.  But if you have a choice, don't buy it this pc!

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Pentium Processor 2.13GHz
4GB DDR3 RAM
500GB 5400RPM Hard Drive
13.3-Inch Screen, Intel HD Graphics
Windows 7 Home Premium
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite L635-S3100 13.3-Inch LED Laptop (Grey)
